channel.title: Kaseya vsa script
channel.description:
I have a feeling this is the wrong cat, but i am using kaseya vsa and i am a newbie i have been trying to wrtie the same registry script for a day now... If anyone has scripting ps knowledge and can help me out... i would beyond appreciate it so much!
reg delete HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\default\Settings\AllowSignInOptions /v 0
this is a basic cmd command to switch the win10 machine to not basically work with a microsoft account local only. But........... for the love of god it will not work correctly when inserting into kaseya......
message me let me know. If anyone does no kaseya i would have no issues paying via venmo no questions asked.

item.title: Kaseya vsa script
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
